name: Hello, Hello, Hello
description:
Policing the Miners' Strike was hard. It caused many divides in the community with local bobbies.
They tried hard but eventually turned against us and us against them.

There is still distrust in the Police in this community. Nothing has changed then has it?

1984-85 Miners strike

coal.faithgrace.co.uk

A series of 100 NFTs
